info.title: Standard data stores
info.description: This page includes reference documentation for working with the Open Cloud v1 API for standard data stores. For information on using the v2 API, see the [usage guide](/cloud/guides/data-stores/index.md).

get.summary: List data stores in an experience
get.description: Returns a list of an experience's data stores.

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Provide to request the next set of data.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Each call only reads one partition, so it can return fewer than the given value when running out of objectives on one partition.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Provide to return only data stores with this prefix.

data.description: An array of data stores in the target experience.

nextPageCursor.description: Indicates that there is more data available in the requested result set.

get.description:
Returns a list of entry keys within a data store.

 Entries marked deleted with a tombstone version are still included in the response if they have yet to be permanently deleted.

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The value is `global` by default. See [Scopes](/cloud-services/data-stores/index.md#scopes).

parameters.name: allScopes
parameters.description: Set to true to return keys from all scopes.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Provide to return only keys with this prefix.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Provide to request the next set of data.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Each call only reads one partition, so it can return fewer than the given value when running out of objectives on one partition.

keys.description: An array of entry keys within the target data store.

nextPageCursor.description: Indicates that there is more data available in the requested result set.

get.description:
Returns the value and metadata associated with an entry.

Entries marked deleted with a tombstone version will return 404 Not Found.

Metadata can be found in the response headers like the following:
```text
content-md5: zuYxEhwuySMv0i8CitXImw==
roblox-entry-version: 08D9E6A3F2188CFF.0000000001.08D9E6A3F2188CFF.01
roblox-entry-created-time: 2022-02-02T23:30:06.5388799+00:00
roblox-entry-version-created-time: 2022-02-02T23:30:06.5388799+00:00
roblox-entry-attributes: { "myAttribute": "myValue" }
roblox-entry-userids: [1, 2, 3]
```

| Header | Description |
|---|---| 
| `content-md5` | The base64-encoded MD5 checksum of the content. See [Content-MD5](/cloud/guides/data-stores/request-handling.md#content-md5). |
| `roblox-entry-version` | The version of the returned entry. |
| `roblox-entry-created-time` | The time at which the entry was created. |
| `roblox-entry-version-created-time` | The time at which this particular version was created. |
| `roblox-entry-attributes` | Attributes tagged with the entry. Serialized JSON map object. |
| `roblox-entry-userids` | Comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs tagged with the entry. |

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

parameters.name: entryKey
parameters.description: The key identifying the entry.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The value is `global` by default. See [Scopes](/cloud-services/data-stores/index.md#scopes).

content-md5.description: The base64-encoded MD5 checksum of the content. See [Content-MD5](/cloud/guides/data-stores/request-handling.md#content-md5).

roblox-entry-version.description: The version of the returned entry.

roblox-entry-created-time.description: The time at which the entry was created.

roblox-entry-version-created-time.description: The time at which this particular version was created.

roblox-entry-attributes.description: Attributes tagged with the entry. Serialized JSON map object.

roblox-entry-userids.description: Comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs tagged with the entry.

schema.description: The user content of the entry.

204.description: The key is marked as deleted.

post.description: Sets the value, metadata and user IDs associated with an entry.

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

parameters.name: entryKey
parameters.description: The key identifying the entry.

parameters.name: matchVersion
parameters.description: Provide to update only if the current version matches this.

parameters.name: exclusiveCreate
parameters.description: Create the entry only if it does not exist.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The value is `global` by default. See [Scopes](/cloud-services/data-stores/index.md#scopes).

parameters.name: roblox-entry-attributes
parameters.description: Attributes to be associated with new version of the entry. Serialized by JSON map objects. If not provided, existing attributes are cleared.

parameters.name: roblox-entry-userids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs tagged with the entry. If not provided, existing user IDs are cleared.

parameters.name: content-md5
parameters.description: The base64-encoded MD5 checksum of the content. See [Content-MD5](/cloud/guides/data-stores/request-handling.md#content-md5).

x-roblox-scopes.name: universe-datastores.objects:update
x-roblox-scopes.description: If the entry key being set exists.

x-roblox-scopes.name: universe-datastores.objects:create
x-roblox-scopes.description: If the entry key being set doesn't exist.

x-roblox-scopes.name: universe-datastores.control:create
x-roblox-scopes.description: If the Data Store the entry key is in doesn't exist.

delete.description: Marks the entry as deleted by creating a tombstone version. Entries are deleted permanently after 30 days.

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

parameters.name: entryKey
parameters.description: The key identifying the entry.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The value is `global` by default. See [Scopes](/cloud-services/data-stores/index.md#scopes).

post.description:
Increments the value for an entry by a given amount, or create a new entry with that amount. Returns the entry and metadata.

Metadata can be found in the response headers like the following:
```text
content-md5: zuYxEhwuySMv0i8CitXImw==
roblox-entry-version: 08D9E6A3F2188CFF.0000000001.08D9E6A3F2188CFF.01
roblox-entry-created-time: 2022-02-02T23:30:06.5388799+00:00
roblox-entry-version-created-time: 2022-02-02T23:30:06.5388799+00:00
roblox-entry-attributes: { "myAttribute": "myValue" }
roblox-entry-userids: [1, 2, 3]
```

| Header | Description |
|---|---| 
| `content-md5` | The base64-encoded MD5 checksum of the content. See [Content-MD5](/cloud/guides/data-stores/request-handling.md#content-md5). |
| `roblox-entry-version` | The version of the returned entry. |
| `roblox-entry-created-time` | The time at which the entry was created. |
| `roblox-entry-version-created-time` | The time at which this particular version was created. |
| `roblox-entry-attributes` | Attributes tagged with the entry. Serialized JSON map object. |
| `roblox-entry-userids` | Comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs tagged with the entry. |

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

parameters.name: entryKey
parameters.description: The key identifying the entry.

parameters.name: incrementBy
parameters.description: The amount by which the entry should be incremented, or the starting value if it doesn't exist.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The value is `global` by default. See [Scopes](/cloud-services/data-stores/index.md#scopes).

parameters.name: roblox-entry-attributes
parameters.description: Attributes to be associated with new version of the entry. Serialized by JSON map objects. If not provided, existing attributes are cleared.

parameters.name: roblox-entry-userids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs that the entry is tagged with. If not provided, existing user IDs are cleared.

200.description: Returns the latest version of the entry after it has been incremented.

content-md5.description: The base64-encoded MD5 checksum of the content. See [Content-MD5](/cloud/guides/data-stores/request-handling.md#content-md5).

roblox-entry-version.description: The version of the returned entry.

roblox-entry-created-time.description: The time at which the entry was created.

roblox-entry-version-created-time.description: The time at which this particular version was created.

roblox-entry-attributes.description: Attributes tagged with the entry. Serialized JSON map object.

roblox-entry-userids.description: Comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs tagged with the entry.

schema.description: The user content of the entry.

204.description: The key is marked as deleted.

x-roblox-scopes.name: universe-datastores.objects:update
x-roblox-scopes.description: If the entry key being incremented exists.

x-roblox-scopes.name: universe-datastores.objects:create
x-roblox-scopes.description: If the entry key being incremented doesn't exist.

x-roblox-scopes.name: universe-datastores.control:create
x-roblox-scopes.description: If the Data Store the entry key is in doesn't exist.

get.description:
Returns the value and metadata of a specific version of an entry.

Metadata can be found in the response headers like the following:
```text
content-md5: zuYxEhwuySMv0i8CitXImw==
roblox-entry-version: 08D9E6A3F2188CFF.0000000001.08D9E6A3F2188CFF.01
roblox-entry-created-time: 2022-02-02T23:30:06.5388799+00:00
roblox-entry-version-created-time: 2022-02-02T23:30:06.5388799+00:00
roblox-entry-attributes: { "myAttribute": "myValue" }
roblox-entry-userids: [1, 2, 3]
```

| Header | Description |
|---|---| 
| `content-md5` | The base64-encoded MD5 checksum of the content. See [Content-MD5](/cloud/guides/data-stores/request-handling.md#content-md5). |
| `roblox-entry-version` | The version of the returned entry. |
| `roblox-entry-created-time` | The time at which the entry was created. |
| `roblox-entry-version-created-time` | The time at which this particular version was created. |
| `roblox-entry-attributes` | Attributes tagged with the entry. Serialized JSON map object. |
| `roblox-entry-userids` | Comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs tagged with the entry. |

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

parameters.name: entryKey
parameters.description: The key identifying the entry.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: The version to inspect.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The value is `global` by default. See [Scopes](/cloud-services/data-stores/index.md#scopes).

content-md5.description: The base64-encoded MD5 checksum of the content. See [Content-MD5](/cloud/guides/data-stores/request-handling.md#content-md5).

roblox-entry-version.description: The version of the returned entry.

roblox-entry-created-time.description: The time at which the entry was created.

roblox-entry-version-created-time.description: The time at which this particular version was created.

roblox-entry-attributes.description: Attributes tagged with the entry. Serialized JSON map object.

roblox-entry-userids.description: Comma-separated list of Roblox user IDs tagged with the entry.

schema.description: The user content of the entry.

get.description: Returns a list of versions for an entry.

parameters.name: universeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the experience with data stores that you want to access. You can find your experience's universe ID on Creator Hub.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

parameters.name: entryKey
parameters.description: The key identifying the entry.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The value is `global` by default. See [Scopes](/cloud-services/data-stores/index.md#scopes).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Provide to request the next set of data.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Provide to not include versions earlier than this timestamp.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Provide to not include versions later than this timestamp.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Either `Ascending` (earlier versions first) or `Descending` (later versions first).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Each call only reads one partition, so it can return fewer than the given value when running out of objectives on one partition.

404.description: The experience or data store was not found.

DataStore.description: The data store object with its name and created time.

name.description: The name of your data store.

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the data store was created in the ISO time format.

EntryVersion.description: The entry version object returned by the `List Entry Versions` method.

version.description: The version name of the qualifying entry.

deleted.description: Indicates whether the entry has been deleted.

createdTime.description: The timestamp of when the version was created in the ISO time format.

objectCreatedTime.description: The timestamp of when the data store was created in the ISO time format.

roblox-api-key.description: A configurable key that allows granular access to Roblox resources. See https://create.roblox.com/docs/cloud/auth/api-keys for more information.
roblox-api-key.name: x-api-key
